sentences.en: A pestilence on the witless little dunce!
Billy: It means good luck you dunce.
sentences.cn: 比利: 意思就是祝你好运,呆子.

sentences.en: Do you take me for a dunce?
sentences.cn: 你以为我是笨蛋 吗 ?

sentences.en: He used to be a dunce at school.
sentences.cn: 他上学时曾是个笨学生.

sentences.en: I was a dunce at chemistry.
sentences.cn: 我在化学方面是个劣等生.

sentences.en: In high school, I was always the dunce of the class and had to sit outside.
sentences.cn: 上中学的时候我一直是班里的呆子,不得不坐在外面.

sentences.en: It is very impolite to call others a dunce.
sentences.cn: 叫别人蠢材是不礼貌的.

sentences.en: Michael may have been a dunce at mathematics, but he was gifted at languages.
sentences.cn: 迈克尔在数学上可能不太灵光，但在语言方面很有天赋。

sentences.en: The dunce was easily taken in.
sentences.cn: 那笨蛋很容易就受骗了.

sentences.en: The wise man knows he knows nothing; the dunce thinks he knows all.
sentences.cn: 聪明人知道自己不懂什么, 蠢人则认为自己什么都懂.

sentences.en: What a donkey, dolt and dunce!
sentences.cn: 真是个笨驴, 呆子,兼傻瓜!

sentences.en: When he changed his school to Brighton, his reputation as a dunce followed him.
sentences.cn: 当他转校到布赖顿时, 他作为劣等生的名声也跟他一起到了那里.

trans.tran_en: If you say that someone is a dunce, you think they are stupid because they find it difficult or impossible to learn what someone is trying to teach them
